alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 1:44PM MDT until June 05 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Judith Basin County in central Montana... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 144 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles south of Stanford, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Utica and Sapphire Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
